General.Name: PT Ciputra Development Tbk
General.Description: PT Ciputra Development Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, develops and sells real estate properties in Indonesia. The company operates through, Real Estate, Rental, and Other segments. It develops, sells, and maintains houses, shophouses, warehouses, apartments, office towers, shopping centers, hotels, golf courses, waterparks, and hospitals and healthcare activities. The company was formerly known as PT Citra Habitat Indonesia and changed its name to PT Ciputra Development Tbk in December 1990. PT Ciputra Development Tbk was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Ciputra Development Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sang Pelopor.

8.Name: Mr. Marius Ignatius Meiko Handoyo Lukmantara
8.Title: Director of Operation & Director
